title: Introducing “That Scene with Dan Patrick” - featuring Adam Sandler
itunes:title: Introducing “That Scene with Dan Patrick” - featuring Adam Sandler
description:
Introducing “That Scene with Dan Patrick”, Dan’s new podcast in which he chats with celebrities and filmmakers to break down some of the most iconic scenes from their careers. Take a listen to the first episode of the new show featuring Adam Sandler discussing his memorable fight scene with Bob Barker in ‘Happy Gilmore’ and follow the podcast in the Amazon Music app to get all-new episodes featuring celebrities like Will Ferrell, David Spade, Elisha Cuthbert, and more. 

Check out the full series and  listen to new episodes at amzn.to/ThatScene

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
